subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: On the eve of Formula One’s showcase race at Monaco on Sunday, the Brawn Grand Prix racing team has snatched triumph from seeming demise with the help of the driver Jenson Button.
snippet: On the eve of Formula One’s showcase race at Monaco on Sunday, the Brawn Grand Prix racing team has snatched triumph from seeming demise with the help of the driver Jenson Button.
